Psilotum nudum (L.) Beauv. 科名：PSILOTACEAE
漢名：松葉蕨
Synonyms
Description
Aerial stems green, erect or pendent, 10-50 cm long, angular; leaves awl-shaped, 1-2 mm long. Widely distributed in tropics and subtropics. Terrestrial or more often epiphytic; small plants usuall erect; large plants pendent.
Specimen collections
TAIPEI: Tatungshan, Kuo 2334*. IISINCHU: Manabashan, Do 725. NANTOU: Chingshuikou, Huang 1940. PINGTUNG: Nanjenshan, Kao 73440. TAITUNG: Tawu, Chuang 3461; Is. Lanyu, Huang & Kao 5458. HUALIEN: Chingshuishan, Nakamura 3578.

Lycopodium annotinum L. 科名：LYCOPODIACEAE
漢名：杉葉蔓石松
Synonyms
Description
Terrestrial plants; main stems trailing on ground, leafy branches numerous, erect, simple or once forked, usually terminated by a single sessile strobilus. Sterile leaves elliptical, the margins slightly serrulate, 4-6 mm long, rigid and spirally arranged, spreading horizontally or somewhat reflexed with up-curved apices. Strobili 14-20 cm long; sporophylls ovoid, cuspidate, the margins erose. Distributed in the cooler regions of the northern hemisphere. Seldom in mountain forests.
Specimen collections
nodata

Lycopodium carinatum Desv. 科名：LYCOPODIACEAE
漢名：覆葉石松
Synonyms
Description
Epiphytes, pendent; stems 65-80 cm long, 3-5 mm in diameter, forking. Leaves lanceolate, 7-10 mm long, pointing towards apex, appressed decreasing in size towards apex and merging intosporophylls. Fertile spikes 2, terminal, 10-15 cm long, 3 mm thick. Distributed in tropical Asia, Hainan, the Ryukyus, Taiwan and Polynesia. Epiphytic in mountain forests.
Specimen collections
nodata

d:entry.d:title: Front/Back Matter
d:entry.div: This is Flora of Taiwan 2 dictionary.

To see this page,
Open "Go" menu.
Choose "Front/Back Matter" menu item. If it has sub-menu items, choose one of them.

To prepare the menu item, do the followings.
Prepare this page source as an entry.
Add "DCSDictionaryFrontMatterReferenceID" key and its value to the plist of the dictionary. The value should be the string of this page entry id.
